distinct
from SYSTEM_INVOICE
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update SYSTEM_INVOICE
INV_ID = #{record.invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_MONTH = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INV_VERSION = #{record.invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INV_REF_NO = #{record.invRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_DT = #{record.modifyDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEQ_ID = #{record.seqId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

INV_DUE_DT = #{record.invDueDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{record.attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SYSTEM_INVOICE set INV_ID = #{record.invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_MONTH = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_VERSION = #{record.invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INV_REF_NO = #{record.invRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_COMP = #{record.billComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NAME = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_STATUS = #{record.invStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_BY = #{record.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_DT = #{record.modifyDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEQ_ID = #{record.seqId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_LATEST_VER = #{record.isLatestVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_SEND_OUT_DT = #{record.invSendOutDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INV_DUE_DT = #{record.invDueDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{record.attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYSTEM_INVOICE
INV_REF_NO = #{invRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_COMP = #{billComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INV_STATUS = #{invStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INV_DUE_DT = #{invDueDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INV_ID = #{invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CURRENT_MONTH = #{currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and INV_VERSION = #{invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
